name: relinquished
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
relinquish
to give up something such as a responsibility or claim: He has relinquished his claim to the throne. She relinquished control of the family investments to her son.
to unwillingly stop holding or keeping something: She relinquished her hold/grip on the steering wheel.
